name: gateway-comparison-qh4rc
description: Gateway comparison - NGINX Ingress vs Traefik vs Envoy Gateway feature and performance analysis

costEstimate.note: Rough estimate based on on-demand GCE pricing; actual cost may differ.

analysis.summary: Gateway comparison experiment evaluated NGINX Ingress, Traefik, and Envoy Gateway over 2h22m. The experiment completed successfully with validation workflow finishing in under 4 minutes. Total infrastructure cost was $0.047, making this an efficient benchmark for gateway feature and performance analysis.

metricInsights.cpu_usage: CPU usage tracked across all three gateways over the 2h22m duration with 5-minute granularity, showing compute efficiency and resource consumption patterns under various workload scenarios.
metricInsights.memory_usage: Memory working set measurements captured footprint differences between NGINX Ingress, Traefik, and Envoy Gateway, revealing which gateway implementation has the smallest resource overhead.

recommendations: Add request latency (p50, p95, p99) and throughput (requests/sec) metrics to quantify performance differences beyond resource usage
Include error rate tracking to assess gateway reliability under load
Consider extending test duration or adding synthetic load patterns to stress-test each gateway's behavior under peak conditions
